all_products_deleted.description: Notification message when all products are deleted

confirm_delete_all_products.description: Confirmation message to delete all products
confirm_delete_all_products.message: Do you confirm the removal of all products from the list?

lowest_price_in_30_days.description: Label for the lowest price in the last 30 days

max_six_products.description: Error message when trying to add more than six products
max_six_products.message: You can add up to 6 products. Remove a product to add a new one.

no_data_in_response.description: Error message when no data is received in the response

no_product_details_to_save.description: Error message when there are no product details to save
no_product_details_to_save.message: No product details available to save

price_without_code.description: Label for the price without a discount code

product_already_on_list.description: Error message when the product is already on the list
product_already_on_list.message: The selected product is already on the list

product_deleted.description: Notification message when a product is deleted

product_saved.description: Notification message when a product is saved

response_received.description: Prefix for the message indicating a response was received

track_price_action_triggered.description: Notification message when the track price action is triggered

trackPrice_action.description: Action command for tracking the price
